dict.string: This app uses Apple Music to play songs that match your mood.
TalluriGMoodifyApp needs microphone access for voice search feature
TalluriGMoodifyApp needs location access to find concerts near you
TalluriGMoodifyApp uses location to find nearby concerts and events
TalluriGMoodifyApp uses motion detection for shake to shuffle feature
TalluriGMoodifyApp uses speech recognition to search for music and moods using voice commands for a hands-free experience.
